Package RRPSS

Class TablePlanner

java.lang.Object
RRPSS.TablePlanner
public class TablePlanner extends Object
A Table Planner class which holds an array of multiple Tables with different number of seats. Only ONE Table Planner per Restaurant.
Author:
YANGY

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TablePlanner()
    Default constructor class which creates a fixed number of tables and their seats.
